card.name: Apothecary White
card.property: Vigilance Whenever you attack, you create a Food token for each player being attacked. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.") {W}, {T}, Tap X untapped Foods you control: Create X 1/1 white Human creature tokens.

card.name: Senator Peacock
card.property: Artifacts you control are Clues in addition to their other types and have "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card." Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, target creature can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Mastermind Plum
card.property: Whenever Mastermind Plum attacks, exile up to one target card from a graveyard. If an artifact card was exiled this way, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") Whenever you cast a spell, if mana from a Treasure was spent to cast it, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Headliner Scarlett
card.property: Haste When Headliner Scarlett enters, creatures target player controls can't block this turn. At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library face down. You may look at and play that card this turn.

card.name: Emissary Green
card.property: Whenever Emissary Green attacks, starting with you, each player votes for profit or security. You create a number of Treasure tokens equal to twice the number of profit votes. Put a number of +1/+1 counters on each creature you control equal to the number of security votes.

card.property: Vigilance Other Soldiers you control have vigilance, trample, and haste. {2}{R}{W}: Until end of turn, Soldiers you control gain "Whenever this creature attacks, it deals 1 damage to defending player."

Afterlife Insurance
card.property: Creatures you control gain afterlife 1 until end of turn. Draw a card. (When a creature with afterlife 1 dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)

card.name: Amzu, Swarm's Hunger
card.property: Flying, menace Other Insects you control have menace. Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, you may create a 1/1 black and green Insect creature token, then put a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the greatest mana value among those cards. Do this only once each turn.

card.name: Boros Strike-Captain
card.property: Battalion — Whenever Boros Strike-Captain and at least two other creatures attack, exile the top card of your library. During any turn you attacked with three or more creatures, you may play that card.

card.name: Carnage Interpreter
card.property: When Carnage Interpreter enters, discard your hand, then investigate four times. (To investigate, create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") As long as you have one or fewer cards in hand, Carnage Interpreter gets +2/+2 and has menace.

card.name: Conclave Evangelist
card.property: Myriad (Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token copy that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.) Whenever Conclave Evangelist deals combat damage to a player, create a token that's a copy of Conclave Evangelist.

card.name: Corporeal Projection
card.property: Target creature you control gains myriad until end of turn. (Whenever it attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token copy that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. card.name: Covetous Elegy
card.property: Each player chooses up to two creatures they control, then sacrifices the rest. Then you create a tapped Treasure token for each creature your opponents control.

card.name: Dimir Strandcatcher
card.property: Flying Whenever you attack, surveil X, where X is the number of opponents being attacked. At the beginning of each end step, if three or more cards were put into your graveyard from anywhere other than the battlefield this turn, draw a card.

card.name: Ecstatic Electromancer
card.property: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever Ecstatic Electromancer enters or attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.property: When Frenzied Gorespawn enters, for each opponent, goad target creature that player controls. Whenever one or more creatures attack one of your opponents, those creatures gain menace until end of turn.

card.name: Furious Spinesplitter

card.name: Herald of Ilharg
card.property: Trample Whenever you cast a creature spell, put two +1/+1 counters on Herald of Ilharg. If that spell has mana value 5 or greater, Herald of Ilharg deals damage equal to the number of counters on it to each opponent.

card.property: Enchant creature When Incriminating Impetus enters, suspect enchanted creature. (It has menace and can't block.) Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

card.property: Vigilance Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") {T}: Add {C}{C}. Activate only during an opponent's turn.

card.name: Lonis, Genetics Expert
card.property: Evolve (Whenever a creature you control enters, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Lonis, investigate that many times. Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control.

card.name: Memory Vampire
card.property: Flying Whenever Memory Vampire deals combat damage to a player, any number of target players each mill that many cards. Then you may collect evidence 9. When you do, you may cast target nonland card from defending player's graveyard without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Battlefront Krushok
card.property: Battlefront Krushok can't be blocked by more than one creature. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it can't be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Beast Whisperer
card.property: Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.

card.name: Challenger Troll
card.property: Each creature you control with power 4 or greater can't be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Colossal Majesty
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card.

card.name: Duskshell Crawler
card.property: When Duskshell Crawler enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

card.name: Enraged Ceratok
card.property: Enraged Ceratok can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

card.name: Fungal Rebirth
card.property: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. If a creature died this turn, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

card.name: Giant Adephage
card.property: Trample Whenever Giant Adephage deals combat damage to a player, create a token that's a copy of Giant Adephage.

card.name: Gift of Strength
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains reach until end of turn.

card.name: Ivy Lane Denizen
card.property: Whenever another green creature you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Kraul Harpooner
card.property: Reach Undergrowth — When Kraul Harpooner enters, choose up to one target creature you don't control with flying. Kraul Harpooner gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard, then you may have Kraul Harpooner fight that creature.

card.name: Kraul Warrior
card.property: {5} {G}: Kraul Warrior gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Kronch Wrangler
card.property: Trample Whenever a creature you control with power 4 or greater enters, put a +1/+1 counter on Kronch Wrangler.

card.name: Nissa's Judgment
card.property: Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.) Choose up to one target creature an opponent controls. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals damage equal to its power to that creature.

card.name: Overcome
card.property: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn. (Each of those creatures can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

card.name: Predatory Impetus
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3, must be blocked if able, and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

card.name: Sauroform Hybrid
Steeple Creeper
card.property: {3} {U}: Steeple Creeper gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Territorial Boar
card.property: Whenever a creature you control with power 4 or greater enters, Territorial Boar gets +1/+1 and gains vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Thrashing Mossdog
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Scavenge {4}{G}{G} ({4}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Transluminant
card.property: {W}, Sacrifice Transluminant: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Vines of the Recluse
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+2 and gains reach until end of turn. Untap it. (A creature with reach can block creatures with flying.)

card.name: Wildsize
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Wildwood Patrol
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

card.name: Yeva's Forcemage
card.property: When Yeva's Forcemage enters, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Clan Defiance
card.property: Choose one or more — • Clan Defiance deals X damage to target creature with flying. • Clan Defiance deals X damage to target creature without flying. • Clan Defiance deals X damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Curse of Chains
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of each upkeep, tap enchanted creature.

card.name: Deadbridge Chant
card.property: When Deadbridge Chant enters, mill ten cards. At the beginning of your upkeep, choose a card at random in your graveyard. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

card.name: Depose // Deploy
card.property: Tap target creature. Draw a card. // Create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying, then you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

alternate.name: Depose
alternate.property: Tap target creature. Draw a card.

alternate.name: Deploy
alternate.property: Create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying, then you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

card.name: Dimir Guildmage
card.property: ({U/B} can be paid with either {U} or {B}.) {3}{U}: Target player draws a card. Activate only as a sorcery. {3}{B}: Target player discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Discovery // Dispersal

alternate.name: Discovery
alternate.property: Surveil 2, then draw a card. (To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

alternate.name: Dispersal
alternate.property: Each opponent returns a nonland permanent they control with the highest mana value among permanents they control to its owner's hand, then discards a card.

card.name: Duskmantle Seer
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, each player reveals the top card of their library, loses life equal to that card's mana value, then puts it into their hand.

card.name: Firemane Avenger
card.property: Flying Battalion — Whenever Firemane Avenger and at least two other creatures attack, Firemane Avenger deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

card.name: Firespout
card.property: Firespout deals 3 damage to each creature without flying if {R} was spent to cast this spell and 3 damage to each creature with flying if {G} was spent to cast this spell. (Do both if {R}{G} was spent.)

card.name: Footlight Fiend
card.property: When Footlight Fiend dies, it deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Fresh-Faced Recruit
card.property: During your turn, Fresh-Faced Recruit has first strike.

card.name: Frostburn Weird
card.property: {U/R}: Frostburn Weird gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Golgari Guildmage
Hydroid Krasis
card.property: When you cast this spell, you gain half X life and draw half X cards. Round down each time. Flying, trample Hydroid Krasis enters with X +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Hypersonic Dragon
card.property: Flying, haste You may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash. (You may cast them any time you could cast an instant.)

card.name: Incubation // Incongruity

alternate.name: Incubation
alternate.property: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

alternate.name: Incongruity
alternate.property: Exile target creature. That creature's controller creates a 3/3 green Frog Lizard creature token.

card.name: Integrity // Intervention

alternate.name: Integrity
alternate.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

alternate.name: Intervention
alternate.property: Intervention deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

card.name: Lavinia of the Tenth
card.property: Protection from red When Lavinia of the Tenth enters, detain each nonland permanent your opponents control with mana value 4 or less. (Until your next turn, those permanents can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)

card.name: Master Biomancer
card.property: Each other creature you control enters with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to Master Biomancer's power and as a Mutant in addition to its other types.

card.name: Orzhov Guildmage
Pit Fight
card.property: Target creature you control fights another target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

card.name: Pitiless Gorgon
card.property: Deathtouch

card.name: Rakdos Shred-Freak
card.property: Haste

card.name: Rakdos, the Showstopper
card.property: Flying, trample When Rakdos, the Showstopper enters, flip a coin for each creature that isn't a Demon, Devil, or Imp. Destroy each creature whose coin comes up tails.

card.name: Scuttlegator
card.property: Defender {6}{G/U}{G/U}: Adapt 3. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put three +1/+1 counters on it.) As long as Scuttlegator has a +1/+1 counter on it, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.

card.name: Selesnya Guildmage
Seraph of the Scales
card.property: Flying {W}: Seraph of the Scales gains vigilance until end of turn. {B}: Seraph of the Scales gains deathtouch until end of turn. Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)

card.name: Snakeform
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a green Snake with base power and toughness 1/1. Draw a card.

card.name: Status // Statue

alternate.name: Status
alternate.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.

alternate.name: Statue
alternate.property: Destroy target artifact, creature, or enchantment.

card.name: Supreme Verdict
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Destroy all creatures.

card.name: Thief of Sanity
card.property: Flying Whenever Thief of Sanity deals combat damage to a player, look at the top three cards of that player's library, exile one of them face down, then put the rest into their graveyard. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast that spell.

card.name: Trostani Discordant
card.property: Other creatures you control get +1/+1. When Trostani Discordant enters, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens with lifelink. At the beginning of your end step, each player gains control of all creatures they own.

card.name: Turn to Mist
card.property: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Underrealm Lich
card.property: If you would draw a card, instead look at the top three cards of your library, then put one into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Pay 4 life: Underrealm Lich gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

card.name: Vernadi Shieldmate
card.property: Vigilance

card.name: Vizkopa Vampire
card.property: Lifelink

card.name: Whisper Agent
card.property: Flash When Whisper Agent enters, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.property: Azorius Chancery enters tapped. When Azorius Chancery enters, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {W}{U}.

card.property: Vigilance Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") {T}: Add {C}{C}. Activate only during an opponent's turn.
